body:
Agreed. This should be easy to fix, PRs welcome.

EDIT: Ideally the PR would come with a test though :) see `*CDI*Test` in `extensions/hibernate-orm/deployment/src/test/java`

rename.from: Be more consistent about the CDI qualifiers we apply to Hiberante Search/ORM beans
rename.to: Be more consistent about the CDI qualifiers we apply to Hibernate Search/ORM beans

body: @yrodiere Can I work on this issue, I am new to quarkus and want to explore by learning.

Hey @Aryant-Tripathi sure üôÇ
You can work on this one and open a pull request once you have the changes ready.
If you are new to Quarkus, I'd encourage you to have a look at the contributing guide to help you set up the env and learn how to make your first steps around Quarkus: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md

Hey @yrodiere @marko-bekhta I know this is a very small change, I have made changes but I am not sure about creating destination of the test case which file should contain. Can you explain help me a little about how can i test this and where i can create the test case. 

I am really sorry asking about asking this dumb question üôÇ
